thread.title: WATCH: Bradley Cooper sings Eagles fight song with owner Jeffrey Lurie
thread.title_full: WATCH: Bradley Cooper sings Eagles fight song with owner Jeffrey Lurie

author: Matt Lombardo | For NJ Advance Media
title: WATCH: Bradley Cooper sings Eagles fight song with owner Jeffrey Lurie
text:
â€” CBScreener (@CBGrabsandGIFS) October 20, 2015 
Noted Eagles fan and Philadelphia native Bradley Cooper was a guest of team owner Jeffrey Lurie for Monday night's 27-7 victory over the Giants at Lincoln Financial Field and as you can see in the video above, not shy about showing his hometown pride. 
WATCH: Star Wars: The Force Awakens Trailer 
Cooper, who was nominated for an Academy Award for his performance as a troubled Eagles fan in the 2012 film Silver Linings Playbook , often lends his voice to the team's pump up videos prior to the season or big games. However, on Monday night Cooper's voice was just many in the crowd belting out the team's fight song 'Fly Eagles Fly.'
